dmca.title: Tatum Complains of Posted Contracts
dmca.body:
Our law firm, DLA Piper US LLP, represents Tatum LLC ("Tatum"). Tatum recently learned that Onecle lnc. ("Onecle") affirmatively violated federal, state and common law, by improperly using Tatum's intellectual property on Onecle's website. Specifically, Onecle's website features a Tatum LLC "Full-Time Permanent Engagement Resources Agreement" dated July 12, 2007. Onecle's improper and unlawful use of Tatum's intellectual property has damaged Tatum.

Tatum demands that Onecle immediately cease and desist use of any and all agreements, documents, contracts, engagement letters, written works of Tatum employees, or other proprietary information and intellectual property, whether written or electronic, now and in the future, directly or indirectly referencing Tatum LLC. Tatum further demands that Onecle immediately cease and desist distributing hard copies of any Tatum intellectual property.

If Onecle fails to meet the demands set forth in this letter, Tatum will pursue all rights and remedies available to it under the law. lf you have questions, please contact me.
